title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Elementary Students' Software Preference Analysis and Educational Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply three drill-and-practice methodologies for designing software preference surveys targeting elementary students.
Learners can independently develop research questionnaires analyzing gender/age-based differences in software preferences.
Learners can design assessment tools measuring project-based learning effectiveness in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
